College of Medicine Departments & Centers

The College of Medicine is comprised of both clinical and basic science departments that are involved in education, clinical care, and research in the basic, translational and clinical sciences.

Departments

  • Anesthesia and Perioperative Medicine
  • Biochemistry and Molecular Biology
  • Comparative Medicine (MUSC log-in required)
  • Dermatology
  • Emergency Medicine
  • Family Medicine
  • Medicine
  • Microbiology and Immunology
  • Neurology
  • Neuroscience
  • Neurosurgery

  • Ophthalmology
  • Orthopaedics and Physical Medicine
  • Otolaryngology-Head and Neck Surgery
  • Pathology and Laboratory Medicine
  • Pediatrics
  • Pharmacology
  • Psychiatry and Behavioral Sciences
  • Public Health Sciences
  • Radiation Oncology
  • Radiology
  • Regenerative Medicine and Cell Biology
  • Surgery
  • Urology
